instances.name: Hereville
instances.description: Hereville: A village that is here

rooms.name: Main Entrance
rooms.description: The Main Entrance.

rooms.name: The Gathering Hall
rooms.description: A spacious common area with comfortable seating, perfect for socializing or relaxing.

rooms.name: The Dining Room
rooms.description: A communal dining space where guests can enjoy homemade meals and breakfast together.

rooms.name: The Game Room
rooms.description: Filled with board games, puzzles, and a pool table for entertainment.

rooms.name: The Sky Lounge
rooms.description: An open-air rooftop lounge with stunning views, perfect for evening gatherings.

rooms.name: The Observation Deck
rooms.description: A serene space for stargazing, equipped with telescopes and cozy seating.

rooms.name: The Wellness Spa
rooms.description: A tranquil area for relaxation, featuring massage chairs, aromatherapy, and soft music.

rooms.name: The Pool Area
rooms.description: An inviting outdoor space with a swimming pool, sun loungers, and tropical plants.

rooms.name: The Art Studio
rooms.description: A creative space filled with art supplies, easels, and inspiration for guests.

rooms.name: The Reading Nook
rooms.description: A quiet corner with comfortable chairs and a variety of books for guests to enjoy.

rooms.name: The Cultural Lounge
rooms.description: A room dedicated to showcasing local art, music, and culture, often hosting workshops.

rooms.name: The Yoga Studio
rooms.description: A peaceful room for yoga and meditation classes, with mats and calming decor.

rooms.name: The Fire Pit Area
rooms.description: An outdoor gathering space with a fire pit, perfect for storytelling and roasting marshmallows.

rooms.name: The Pool Bar
rooms.description: An outdoor bar with every type of imaginable frozen drink at hand.

rooms.name: The Twilight Lounge
rooms.description: A cozy, dimly lit space perfect for relaxing with a drink and enjoying conversations.

rooms.name: Lavender Loft
rooms.description: A cozy room adorned with soft purple hues, fragrant lavender plants, and a small balcony overlooking the garden. Features a queen bed, a writing desk, and an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Ocean Breeze Suite
rooms.description: A spacious suite with nautical decor, large windows letting in natural light, and a small kitchenette. Contains a king bed and a private terrace.

rooms.name: Rustic Retreat
rooms.description: A charming room featuring reclaimed wood furniture and earthy tones, with a focus on comfort. Includes a double bed and a shared bathroom.

rooms.name: Starlit Serenity
rooms.description: A serene room designed for stargazing, complete with a skylight and dark blue accents. Contains a queen bed and a small seating area.

rooms.name: Sunny Meadow Room
rooms.description: Bright and cheerful, with yellow accents and floral decorations. This room has two twin beds and access to a shared bathroom.

rooms.name: Mystic Forest Cabin
rooms.description: Inspired by woodland charm, this room features nature-themed decor and a queen bed. Offers a tranquil atmosphere for relaxation.

rooms.name: Vintage Vibes Room
rooms.description: A nostalgic room with retro furnishings, including a record player and vintage artwork. Contains a double bed and a shared bathroom.

rooms.name: Mountain View Haven
rooms.description: A calming room with earthy tones and large windows that provide stunning mountain views. Features a king bed and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Tropical Oasis Room
rooms.description: A vibrant room with palm fronds and colorful accents. Includes a queen bed and a small reading corner.

rooms.name: Cultural Canvas Room
rooms.description: A creatively decorated room showcasing local art, with a double bed and an artistic vibe. Perfect for inspiration.

rooms.name: Zen Den
rooms.description: A minimalist room designed for tranquility, featuring a meditation corner and soft neutral colors. Includes a queen bed and an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Breezy Terrace Room
rooms.description: A light-filled room with large sliding doors that open onto a spacious terrace. Contains a king bed and a small dining area.

rooms.name: Enchanting Evening Room
rooms.description: A romantic room with dim lighting, fairy lights, and plush furnishings. Features a queen bed and an intimate seating area.

rooms.name: Herbal Haven
rooms.description: A fragrant room filled with various herbs and plants, promoting a natural, calming environment. Contains a double bed and a shared bathroom.

rooms.name: Whimsical Workshop
rooms.description: A creative space equipped with art supplies and crafting materials. Great for guests wanting to unleash their artistic side.

rooms.name: Front Desk
rooms.description: The Front Desk. A counter and a broken bell are here.

rooms.name: Coat Closet
rooms.description: A small coat closet.
